participant_abstract.sent: We discussed compontent design, and options for each part of the whole, as well as possibilities and usefulness of all bits of the user interface and some resent trends in fashion and what people want.
We concentrated quite a lot on the key ideas of fashion and simplicity and how to make those ideas work in our final design.

participant_decisions.sent: Kinetic battery*. simple chip*. push buttons.

participant_problems.sent: Is scroll wheel good or not?
Keeping price down*. how to make sure it functions correctly*.
